data.title: 2025 March Madness: Men's NCAA tournament schedule, dates
data.meta_description: Here is the schedule for March Madness 2025, which begins with Selection Sunday on March 16 and ends with the Final Four and the national championship on April 5 and 7.
data.text:
2024 NCAA tournament schedule, scores, highlights

Monday, April 8 (National championship game)

(1) UConn 75, (1) Purdue 60
